alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:22PM EDT until May 26 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR OHIO...SOUTHERN DEARBORN...NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND AND CENTRAL BOONE COUNTIES... At 122 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rising Sun, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Union, Dillsboro, Shawnee, Wilmington, French, Hartford, Aberdeen, Idlewild, Waterloo, Petersburg, Rabbit Hash, Quercus Grove and North Landing. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 180 and 181. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
